string.text: You have been contracted to find and eliminate a target. Return for payment when the task is complete.
Our contractor has a list of outstanding bounties. We need volunteers to carry out these hits discretely, which will allow us to fulfil our obligations to our contractor. Are you interested?
It is done? Great. Here your percentage:
%s are required by %name to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have a proposition for you. If you can bring me some new tools, you will receive payment. Are you up for it?
Good. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some oils and tools I need to do work on firearms. I will pay you for one of these toolkits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Right, on. This is what I've been looking for, thank!
%s are required by %name to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
%s are required by %name to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
